name: American Public Education, Inc.
description: American Public Education, Inc. (APEI) is a leading provider of online higher education and workforce training. Established in 2002, APEI operates through its subsidiaries, including American Public University System (APUS) and Hondros College of Nursing, offering a wide range of degree programs and professional training services. APEI focuses on serving the unique needs of adult learners and military personnel, providing accessible and affordable education solutions. With a commitment to quality, APEI leverages advanced technology to deliver engaging and flexible online courses that empower students to achieve their academic and career goals. The company emphasizes student support and success, offering a variety of resources, including academic advising, tutoring, and career services. APEI's mission is to expand educational access and enhance workforce development, contributing to the personal and professional growth of its students. The company continuously seeks to innovate its educational offerings, aligning with industry demands and evolving job markets. APEI strives to foster a diverse and inclusive learning environment, promoting lifelong learning and skill development.

faq.answer: APEI provides Bachelor's, Master's, and Doctoral degrees, as well as certification programs and workforce training.
